verses.name: Matthew 13:1
verses.text: The same day went Jesus out of the house, and sat by the sea side.

verses.name: Matthew 13:2
verses.text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him, so that he went into a ship, and sat; and the whole multitude stood on the shore.

verses.name: Matthew 13:3
verses.text: And he spake many things unto them in parables, saying, Behold, a sower went forth to sow;

verses.name: Matthew 13:4
verses.text: And when he sowed, some seeds fell by the way side, and the fowls came and devoured them up:

verses.name: Matthew 13:5
verses.text: Some fell upon stony places, where they had not much earth: and forthwith they sprung up, because they had no deepness of earth:
